Package by.karpovich

Class CustomArrayListImpl<E>

java.lang.Object
by.karpovich.CustomArrayListImpl<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements stored in the list
All Implemented Interfaces:
CustomArrayList<E>
public class CustomArrayListImpl<E> extends Object implements CustomArrayList<E>
Implementation of a custom ArrayList data structure. This class provides methods to add, get, remove, and modify elements in the list. The underlying data is stored in an array.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    CustomArrayListImpl()
    Creates a new empty list with a capacity of 10

    Creates a new empty list with a specified capacity of 10
